lore: Just like trees, Ents are not immune to parasites. When one of them becomes infested, it progressively becomes a Timeworn Ent, and its life expectancy is reduced to a few years. Aware of their limited time to help the forest, these creatures exclusively hunt and kill humans no matter what they were doing in the forest. A scientist from Vanelin discovered that they also lose their ability to speak, so it is possible that their sanity is also affected.
menagerieDialog: There is nothing quite like the clean air of a Rodian forest.
I'll make short work of anyone who dares desecrate nature.
This castle smells like a wasteland. I would prefer to leave this place at once.
I feel invigorated in your presence. Thank you for looking after me.
(A little bird is nesting in this creature's branches which is oddly endearing.)
name: Timeworn Ent
